definitions.definition: To give advice to; to offer an opinion to, as worthy or expedient to be followed.
definitions.example: The dentist advised me to brush three times a day.

definitions.definition: To recommend; to offer as advice.
definitions.example: The dentist advised brushing three times a day.

definitions.definition: To give information or notice to; to inform or counsel; — with of before the thing communicated.
definitions.example: The lawyer advised me to drop the case, since there was no chance of winning.

definitions.definition: To look at, watch; to see.
